# replyToAddresses

**Instance Property**

An array of email addresses to use when replying to the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var replyToAddresses: [MEEmailAddress] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the Reply-To header in the message.

The entries in the array specify the email addresses only, and don’t include any additional text. For example, if the Reply-To header in the message includes `Maria Ruiz <mruiz2@icloud.com>`, the array contains `mruiz2@icloud.com`.

## Accessing the Sender and Recipients

- **fromAddress**: The sender’s email address.
- **toAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the primary recipients of the message.
- **ccAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the secondary recipients of the message.
- **bccAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the concealed tertiary recipients of the message.
- **allRecipientAddresses**: An array of email addresses for all recipients of the message.
